casebody.data:
LERSNER, Respondent, v. MILLER et al., Appellants. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

General Term.

May 2, 1893.) Appeal from eleventh district court. Action by Howard G. Lersner against Frank Miller and another.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

E. F. Stern, for appellants. L. P. Mingey, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment reversed, new trial ordered, with costs to abide the event.
